plugin.tooltip: Write Esri (shp, shx and dbf) files from WKT String. Supported files : POINT, MULTIPOINT, ARC, POLYGON, POINTZ, ARCZ, POLYGONZ or MULTIPOINTZ

localized_tooltip.tooltip: Write Esri (shp, shx and dbf) files from WKT String. Supported files : POINT, MULTIPOINT, ARC, POLYGON, POINTZ, ARCZ, POLYGONZ or MULTIPOINTZ
Création de fichiers Esri (shp, shx et dbf) à partir de géométries encodées au format WKT. Fichiers supportés : POINT, MULTIPOINT, ARC, POLYGON, POINTZ, ARCZ, POLYGONZ or MULTIPOINTZ
